    • Method Detail

      • wrapAngle

        public double wrapAngle(double angle)
        Wraps the angle to fit within 0 and 360 degrees
        Parameters:
        angle - the angle to be wrapped
        Returns:
        the new angle value between 0 and 360

      • convertAngle

        public int convertAngle(double radius,
               double width,
               double angle)
        Calculates rotations needed to be performed by both wheels in order to rotate by a certain angle. Rotations needed are calculated by the relative dimensions of the bot accuracy is clipped by casting actual value to an integer value
        Parameters:
        radius - the radius of the wheels
        width - the distance between the wheels
        angle - the angle to convert
        Returns:
        the converted angle

      • calculateAngle

        public double calculateAngle(double initial_x,
                    double initial_y,
                    double final_x,
                    double final_y)
        Calculates the angle to turn to based on the robot's position and the desired destination position
        Parameters:
        initial_x - the robot's X coordinate
        initial_y - the robot's Y coordinate
        final_x - the destination's X coordinate
        final_y - the destination's Y coordinate
        Returns:
        the angle, in radians, to turn to

      • turnTo

        public void turnTo(double target_angle)
        Rotates the robot to the desired angle
        Parameters:
        target_angle - the angle to rotate to

      • travelTo

        public void travelTo(double destination_x,
            double destination_y)
        Moves the robot to the desired coordinate in the grid field by making the motors advance
        Parameters:
        destination_x - the X coordinate to travel to
        destination_y - the Y coordinate to travel to
